blocks.name: cfusgr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with finite simple graphs.

blocks.name: df-fusgr
blocks.content: Define the class of all finite undirected simple graphs without loops (called "finite simple graphs" in the following). A finite simple graph is an undirected simple graph of finite order, i.e. with a finite set of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: isfusgr
blocks.content: The property of being a finite simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: fusgrvtxfi
blocks.content: A finite simple graph has a finite set of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 16-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: isfusgrf1
blocks.content: The property of being a finite simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: isfusgrcl
blocks.content: The property of being a finite simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: fusgrusgr
blocks.content: A finite simple graph is a simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: opfusgr
blocks.content: A finite simple graph represented as ordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 23-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: usgredgffibi
blocks.content: The number of edges in a simple graph is finite iff its edge function is finite. (Contributed by AV, 10-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 22-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgredgffibi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cedg, c0))
} = {
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(crn(c2), cfn))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(crn(c2), cfn)), wcel(c2, universe), wf1(c2, cdm(c2), crab(hs0, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), nat2))))
  fvexi(c2, ciedg, c0)
  usgrfs(hs0, c0, c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  f1vrnfibi(c2, universe, cdm(c2), crab(hs0, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), nat2)))
  eleq1i(c1, cfn, crn(c2))
  3eqtri(c1, crn(c2), cfv(cedg, c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)))
  edgval(c0)
  rneqi(cfv(ciedg, c0), c2)
  eqcomi(cfv(ciedg, c0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cvtx, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgredgffibi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà Fin ‚Üî c2 ‚àà Fin))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Edg ` c0)
} = {
  syl6rbbr(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 ‚àà Fin, c2 ‚àà Fin, ran(c2)‚àà Fin)
  sylancr(c0 ‚àà USGraph, (c2 ‚àà Fin ‚Üî ran(c2)‚àà Fin), c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c2 : dom(c2)‚Ü£ { hs0 ‚àà P((Vtx ` c0))|(# ` hs0)= 2 }))
  fvexi(c2, ciedg, c0)
  usgrfs(hs0, c0, c2, (Vtx ` c0))
  eqid((Vtx ` c0))
  f1vrnfibi(c2, universe, dom(c2), { hs0 ‚àà P((Vtx ` c0))|(# ` hs0)= 2 })
  eleq1i(c1, cfn, ran(c2))
  3eqtri(c1, ran(c2), (Edg ` c0), ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  edgval(c0)
  rneqi((iEdg ` c0), c2)
  eqcomi((iEdg ` c0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Vtx ` c0))
}

blocks.name: fusgredgfi
blocks.content: In a finite simple graph the number of edges which contain a given vertex is also finite. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 21-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fusgredgfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn), wcel(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), universe), wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cn0), wbr(cfv(chash, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0)))), cle, cfv(chash, c2)))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cedg, c0)
  rabexg(s0, c3, universe, wcel(c1, cv(s0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cn0))
  simplbiim(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(cfv(chash, c2), cn0), wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c2, cfn))
  isfusgr(c0, c2)
  hashcl(c2)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(cfv(chash, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0)))), cle, cfv(chash, c2)), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  fusgrusgr(c0)
  usgredgleord(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  hashbnd(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), universe, cfv(chash, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fusgredgfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà Fin), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà Fin), d(s0, c2))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà Fin, { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà ùïå, (# ` c2)‚àà ‚Ñï0, (# ` { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 })[‚â§](# ` c2))
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c3, cedg, c0)
  rabexg(s0, c3, universe, c1 ‚àà s0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, (# ` c2)‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  simplbiim(c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph, (# ` c2)‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0 ‚àà USGraph, c2 ‚àà Fin)
  isfusgr(c0, c2)
  hashcl(c2)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, (# ` { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 })[‚â§](# ` c2), c0 ‚àà USGraph)
  fusgrusgr(c0)
  usgredgleord(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  hashbnd({ s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 }, universe, (# ` c2))
}

blocks.name: usgr1v0e
blocks.content: The size of a (finite) simple graph with 1 vertex is 0. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 22-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgr1v0e(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat0))
  3imtr4d(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat0), wex(hs0, wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  exlimdv(hs0, wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  ex(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  vex(hs0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  biimpi(wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq1i(c1, csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(cvtx, c0))
  usgr1vr(cv(hs0), universe, c0)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(cedg, c0), emptycls))
  eqeq1i(c2, emptycls, cfv(cedg, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wb(wceq(cfv(cedg, c0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wceq(cfv(cedg, c0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), emptycls)), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
  usgruhgr(c0)
  uhgriedg0edg0(c0)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1), wex(hs0, wceq(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, cvtx, c0)
  hash1snb(hs0, c1, universe)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat0), wceq(c2, emptycls)), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, cedg, c0)
  hasheq0(c2, universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cusgr))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c2, emptycls))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgr1v0e(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß(# ` c1)= 1)‚Üí(# ` c2)= 0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
} = {
  imp(c0 ‚àà USGraph, (# ` c1)= 1, (# ` c2)= 0)
  3imtr4d(c0 ‚àà USGraph, (# ` c1)= 1, (# ` c2)= 0, ‚àÉ(hs0, c1 = { hs0 }), c2 = ‚àÖ)
  exlimdv(hs0, c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 = { hs0 }, c2 = ‚àÖ)
  ex(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 = { hs0 }, c2 = ‚àÖ)
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 = { hs0 }), c2 = ‚àÖ, (iEdg ` c0)= ‚àÖ)
  mpd((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 = { hs0 }), (iEdg ` c0)= ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà USGraph)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 = { hs0 })
  sylancr((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 = { hs0 }), (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚Üí(iEdg ` c0)= ‚àÖ), hs0 ‚àà ùïå, (Vtx ` c0)= { hs0 })
  vex(hs0)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 = { hs0 }, (Vtx ` c0)= { hs0 })
  biimpi(c1 = { hs0 }, (Vtx ` c0)= { hs0 })
  eqeq1i(c1, { hs0 }, (Vtx ` c0))
  usgr1vr(hs0, universe, c0)
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 = { hs0 }), c2 = ‚àÖ, (iEdg ` c0)= ‚àÖ, (Edg ` c0)= ‚àÖ)
  eqeq1i(c2, emptycls, (Edg ` c0))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 = { hs0 }, ((Edg ` c0)= ‚àÖ ‚Üî(iEdg ` c0)= ‚àÖ))
  syl(c0 ‚àà USGraph, ((Edg ` c0)= ‚àÖ ‚Üî(iEdg ` c0)= ‚àÖ), c0 ‚àà UHGraph)
  usgruhgr(c0)
  uhgriedg0edg0(c0)
  mp1i(c0 ‚àà USGraph, ((# ` c1)= 1 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0, c1 = { hs0 })), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c1, cvtx, c0)
  hash1snb(hs0, c1, universe)
  mp1i(c0 ‚àà USGraph, ((# ` c2)= 0 ‚Üî c2 = ‚àÖ), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c2, cedg, c0)
  hasheq0(c2, universe)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà USGraph)
  diff.hs0.w(c2 = ‚àÖ)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: usgrfilem
blocks.content: In a finite simple graph, the number of edges is finite iff the number of edges not containing one of the vertices is finite. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgrfilem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfn), wcel(c4, cfn)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s0, c3, wnel(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cfn), wcel(c4, cfn))
  syl5eqel(c4, cfn, crab(s0, c3, wnel(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c3, cfn))
  rabfi(s0, c3, wnel(c1, cv(s0)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn), wcel(c3, cfn))
  syl5eqel(c3, cfn, cun(c4, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)))
  eqtr2i(c3, cun(c4, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0)))), cun(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), c4))
  uncom(c4, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))))
  elnelun(s0, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), c4, c3, c1, cv(s0))
  eqid(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn)), wcel(cun(c4, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0)))), cfn), wa(wcel(c4, cfn), wcel(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn)))
  anim1ci(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cfn), wcel(crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  fusgredgfi(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  unfi(c4, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgrfilem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 ‚àà Fin ‚Üî c4 ‚àà Fin))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 = { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àâ s0 }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid2((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà Fin, c4 ‚àà Fin)
  syl5eqel(c4, cfn, { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àâ s0 }, c3 ‚àà Fin)
  rabfi(s0, c3, c1 ‚àâ s0)
  ex((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà Fin, c3 ‚àà Fin)
  syl5eqel(c3, cfn, (c4 ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 }), ((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß c4 ‚àà Fin))
  eqtr2i(c3, (c4 ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 }), ({ s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚ãÉ c4))
  uncom(c4, { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 })
  elnelun(s0, { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 }, c4, c3, c1, s0)
  eqid({ s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 })
  syl(((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß c4 ‚àà Fin), (c4 ‚ãÉ { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 })‚àà Fin, (c4 ‚àà Fin ‚àß { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà Fin))
  anim1ci((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c4 ‚àà Fin, { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 } ‚àà Fin)
  fusgredgfi(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  unfi(c4, { s0 ‚àà c3 | c1 ‚àà s0 })
}

blocks.name: fusgrfisbase
blocks.content: Induction base for ~ fusgrfis . Main work is done in ~ uhgr0v0e . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 23-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fusgrfisbase(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wcel(c2, cfn))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(cfv(cedg, cop(c0, c2)), cfn))
  syl6eqel(cfv(cedg, cop(c0, c2)), cfn, emptycls, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cuhgr), wceq(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  3ad2ant2(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cuhgr))
  usgruhgr(cop(c0, c2))
  eqtrd(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls, c0, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)))
  3ad2ant1(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, c2)), c0))
  opvtxfv(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  a1d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cusgr), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  biimpd(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  hasheq0(c0, c1)

blocks.name: fusgrfupgrfs
blocks.content: A finite simple graph is a finite pseudograph of finite size. (Contributed by AV, 27-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fusgrfupgrfs(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfusgr), w3a(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c0))
} = {
  3jca(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c2, cfn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  usgrupgr(c0)
  fusgrvtxfi(c0, c1)
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), cfn))
  fusgrfis(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wb(wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), cfn), wcel(c2, cfn)), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  fusgrusgr(c0)
  usgredgffibi(c0, cfv(cedg, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c0))
}
